case.state: Twenty years ago today, I went on my very first outing. I hope you were able to join me on it, ~player~ -- and I hope you'll be there for whatever comes next.
The name's-a Sly Cooper, and I'm-a a thief from a long line of thieves. You might call it the family business.
The name's Sly Cooper, and I'm a thief from a long line of thieves. You might call it the family business.

state.text: Sets Sly's cane and tail to be visible at the start of the game.

case.state: Miss Fox. A little shorter than the one I'm used to, but beautiful all the same.
So what's this I hear about a "Raccoon City?"
Well, well. A raccoon and a fox - a match made in heaven, I'm sure.
Not met many hedgehogs. All of them as cute as you are, Miss Rose?
Another addition to our merry little gang, huh?
You're lucky I don't mind sharing the spotlight, ~player~.
Welcome to the fold. You'll receive your Cooper Gang membership card in the mail.
The more the merrier, right? I'm thinking ~player~ feels the same way.
I'm only used to running with three people, but a few more can't hurt.
You sure know how to attract 'em, huh ~player~?
A game with a whole group of master thieves, huh? You've got guts, ~player~. Just don't expect me to hold back.
So a raccoon, a wolf, a lamb, and a fox walk into a strip poker game...
Don't-a worry. I haven't stolen anything... yet.
Don't worry. I haven't stolen anything... yet.
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ off your hands.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~? Sure, I'll take it.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. Exactly what the doctor ordered.
I could just steal ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ from you, but where's the challenge in that?
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for the inexplicably handsome gray-furred fellow.
~Cards.text~ is the magic number.
Bentley? ~Cards.text~, you think? Well, I trust your judgment, pal.
I'd put money down on ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ if I could.
I'm no Bentley, but I'm pretty sure I did my math right here.
Like taking candy from a hippo.
Five-finger discount. My favorite kind.
Haven't felt this good since the last time I gave Inspector Fox the slip. She's really quite lovely when she's angry.
Learned a mantra in Mesa City's casinos: patience, patience, patience. You need it for heists and cards.
Doesn't take a master thief to steal this victory.
At this rate, I'll be back home in time to catch Murray on TV. He's found some real success in wrestling.
Bentley would admonish me for celebrating too early, but that's never stopped me before.
Slytunkhamen was the first to write in the Thievius Raccoonus. He perfected the art of turning invisible at will... like so.
I do my best under pressure. Can't have some excitement without the fear of failure.
And you thought only dogs could play poker.
You need more wits to evade the police than to play a hand of poker. Turns out I've got more than enough for both.
If I had to compare this to my most difficult heists, it wouldn't even be in the top 50.
There's no honor or challenge in winning a game like this, but there's a lot of fun.
Normally I play for keeps, but I only really wear one set of clothing. Not much use for more.
One of my ancestors was a wild west gunslinger. He played games like this all the time, and always came away with full pockets.
To be a master thief, you need quick wit, sticky fingers... and good luck.
Got a good feeling about this one. Whatever feeling you just got, it definitely wasn't from my cane going through your pockets.
I have to wear a disguise just to get into any casino in the States. There's a good reason for that.
I'm good enough to not need to cheat. Of course, I'm also good enough to not get caught cheating.
None of you can be too mad about me stealing a win, can you? I already got the most important part out of the way.
Any of you check the news lately? Apparently some dashing rogue stole poor David's private parts. Now how's he gonna play strip poker?
Maybe I should introduce Dimitri to this joint. A sleazy lounge lizard like him would love it... On second thought, I'll spare you all the sight of him naked.
Murray? Don't worry, big guy. I'll pick something up for you on the way back.
Hey, Bentley. Everything's going according to plan... The one I just made up, anyway.
My dad always said never to act before the sun goes down. Glad I took his advice.
Too bad there's nothing about luck manipulation in the Thievius Raccoonus.
Showing off for a fine group of people like all of you? I've been in worse situations, that's for sure.
I'm not so low as to cheat at a friendly game of poker. Now, if there were cash on the line...
One of my ancestors learned how to speed up his perception of time. Helps for getting through boring rounds like this.
I always enjoyed a good game of cards at the orphanage. We were more about Go Fish back then, though.
If I'm lucky, I'll get to enjoy a show. If I'm not, I wouldn't exactly count it as a loss either.
So you just press a few buttons and hit "Exchange," huh? Who knew poker was so easy?
This cane of mine has been passed down through my family for generations. Think I'll hold on to it till the end -- wouldn't wanna lose it now.
I'd be trying a little harder if there weren't a fun time involved whether I win or lose.
After a decade or two of pulling off heists, you learn to roll with the punches.
All this stripping reminds me of the last night I spent in Paris. Of course, there wasn't any poker involved then.
This joint is nice. Nobody even started shooting at me when they realized who I was.
Last poker game I played was with a bunch of snakes. Never made that mistake again -- I didn't think "spitting venom" was so literal.
I can turn invisible with the snap of my fingers. Sure would be a shame if I did that right about now.
I'm used to flying by the seat of my pants... Metaphorically, most of the time.
A lot of my ancestors didn't run with crews like I do. Me, I can't imagine going out into the field without somebody watching my back.
Not knowing whether you'll win or lose always gets my blood pumping.
My fur has a pattern like a mask underneath my real mask. Neither do much good at masking my identity.
I always enjoy a nice tango with Miss Fox... with or without the clothes in the way.
I'm not usually kept on my toes like this. Of course, it's more fun this way.
I'm sure Bentley would have some plan to ensure great hands. Me, I prefer flying by the seat of my pants.
Worst comes to worst, I could always snatch somebody else's cards. Heh, only joking.
You all sure a "human" isn't some kinda fake animal? Some guys tried to convince me that "lombaxes" and "ottsels" were real once.
You know, meeting "humans" here explains that treasure hunter guy I fought once. Thought he was just some weird fur-less ape. That's not totally inaccurate, is it?
If any of you ever need any help finding yourselves, I can recommend a guru in the Australian outback. He did a lot of good for Murray.
You keep that engine running, Murray. I'll be over with this before you know it.
This is Sitting Duck. The operation's going as planned.
A lot of my hats serve double-duty as bombs. They make for pretty effective traps. I promise the one I took off is perfectly harmless... probably.
Hope a sudden draft doesn't come through this place. I got enough of freezing my fur off in the Canadian wilderness.
You're all about to count yourselves lucky that I'm not a sore loser.
Sometimes even a thief gets victory stolen from him.
Bet Inspector Fox wishes she could see this. Nothing makes her happier than watching me lose.
Anybody wanna throw this for your old pal Sly? No? Worth a shot.
Could really use one of Bentley's plans right about now... Though, on second thought, it'll probably involve blowing something up.
Takes a thief to beat a thief. In that case, you all might be very good thieves.
The last big heist I went on happened while I was stranded in ancient Egypt. How'd I come back? That's a story for another time.
I'm almost starting to think that whatever mysterious person is dealing these cards isn't affected by my devilish charms.
Normally my fur keeps things concealed down there. Maybe I'm a little too excited for my own good.
Guess acting without thinking does screw you over sometimes.
One of us has to win, right? Well, our lucky victor is more than free to join me if I end up losing.
It might sound like a nickname, but my parents really did name me Sly. My dad was on-the-nose like that.
I don't lose often - and when I do, I always bounce back.
I'll take a seat if it comes down to it, but I hope my tail doesn't get too dirty. You have no idea how much I have to take care of it.
I sure hope you want to see me get put to work, ~player~. Otherwise this is gonna get really awkward for the both of us.
Any of you ever spend a night in a Praguer prison? Lemme tell you, it's not pleasant.
Promised Murray an all-you-can-eat buffet if I win this. Big guy can eat his weight in food and then some.
Can't beat yourself up over every mistake. That's a one-way ticket to getting stuck inside your own head.
Was seeing my most charming feature really not enough for all of you?
Ah, if my ancestors could see me now... On second thought, it's better that they can't.
You win some, you lose some. But for the record, I win a lot more than I lose.
I'm still feeling the effects of the last time Murray made dinner without help. I told him his "hot dog and pizza soup" was a bad idea.
The plan falls apart halfway through and I have to start improvising. It's a good thing that's nothing new.
Carmelita's still mad about that time I faked amnesia so we could be together. We all make mistakes, right?
Bentley? Yeah, I tried jumping and pressing the circle button. It doesn't do much here.
Change of plans, Murray. You crash in with the van, and we'll make off with the loot before they know it...
I think you're all about to count yourselves very lucky.
Not too upset about this, really. I've been wanting to strip since I put these pants on.
I respect a woman who can go outside of her comfort zone. It's quite the bold choice -- and if I do say so myself, it looks stunning on you, Miss Sucrose.
Well now, it seems I'm not the only furry rascal here. The pleasure's mine, Miss Paska.
I've got a little Japanese blood in me, so hopefully I know a thing or two about good poetry. What do you got for me?
Murray? Murray! Did you and Bentley switch bodies again?! This is no time for Steve Urkeling!
Y'know, this is a good time for me to get away from Murray. He's been acting pretty weird since I shot him with that gun.
Now look, I may have murdered a few members of the Fiendish Five, but in my defense, they consented to it.
Inspector Fox has such a way with words. "Hey, bitch, welcome." Music to my ears.
Who would've thought that Benjamin Franklin and George Washington were lesbian lovers? Crazy what the government covers up.
I was here.
Sorry, Miss, but a man can't control things like this. Just take it as a sign of how much I like you.
I guess my thieving is too professional to be a hobby, so... Appreciating fine art, listening to music, same things as anybody else, really.
Life's too short not to embrace who you really are, Dust.
I'm wanted in nearly every country on Earth, Dust. Not much use in hiding it now.
My favorite? The buttercup flower. It symbolizes fortune, and I've got that in spades.
It almost defeats the point of being a thief to have a portrait of yourself... but because you're cute, I'll allow it.
Block out some time and spend it doing nothing but studying. No distractions. Just, uh, don't practice being an assassin on live targets, alright?
And who told you that?
Really? Do you see him anywhere?
That'd be my two best pals, Bentley and Murray. We're set up for a big heist after this, but I wanted to get the fun in beforehand.
If reintroductions are in order, then I'm Sly Cooper, a thief among thieves. No need to be nervous, Miss. I haven't taken out of your pockets quite yet.
Well, let's just say that when us guys talk about our bones, we're not talking about what dogs chase after.
Lotta baseball euphemisms out there. For you, Miss Sucrose, I'd say I want to strike a home run with you.
You've got nothing to worry about, Miss Shtola... Unless you care too much about your valuables, that is.
I can use this cane as a weapon in a pinch, but I wouldn't worry your pretty little head if I were you, Miss Shtola. You're too cute for me to steal from you.
Any of you care for a swim? I'd be happy to join you, but I'm afraid I never learned how. Suppose I'll just have to admire from a distance.
Suppose some of you want to take a dip in the water after this. Almost makes me regret skipping the orphanage swimming lessons.
I'd love to join you all for a swim after this, but I seem to have forgotten my ancestor's water safety technique.
Glad I could enjoy a game in my old stomping grounds. Say, how about I show you all how to pull off a heist after this?
Even after all the jobs I've pulled off here, I'll never get tired of the City of Lights. It's even better when you're viewing it with company.
Paris... Not only is my favorite hideout here, but it was in this city that I first met Inspector Fox. Made a lot of good memories here.
Now this is my kind of territory. Is it bad form to steal from the establishment? Maybe, but what do I care?
Never seen so many fur-less animals in one place before. You guys all shave off a little too much?
I'll admit, this is a little weird for me. Where I come from, everybody's covered in fur or scales.
Even the apes in my world have more than enough fur to go around. Still, I'm more than open to new experiences.
So if I've got this right, you're all kinda like me, but without all the fur in the way? That's a little weird, but I can roll with it.
Is it too much to say that I'm used to squeezing into tight spaces?
This isn't usual for you, huh? I'm a raccoon, and where I'm from, everybody is one form of animal or another. Though you wouldn't look too out-of-place on my Earth either, Fluttershy.

You got it in one. Like I said, it's the family business, stretching all the way back to the caveman days. We record all of our greatest feats and techniques in our family book, the Thievius Raccoonus.
Well, I'm not gonna object to seeing you with a big bushy tail... and maybe a big bush somewhere else.
Now that's just rude, Miss. I keep my fur in tip-top condition -- much as I hate spending time in water.
A master thief and gentleman like myself wouldn't be walking around with dirty fur, Miss, even if I do hate spending a lot of time in water.
Sounds like you've got a good mindset, Meia. I can't claim my crime sprees are motivated too much by altruism, though -- it's more about the thrill.
You sound like a thief I can get along with, Meia. Truth be told, though, my family's always been more about the thrill of a good heist than altruism.
Where I'm from, most animals running around are as large as I am. This your way of saying you want to get a taste of me, Revy?
People like me aren't an unusual sight in my world. You remind me of Inspector Fox, Revy. You've got a wise mouth, but that's just your way of flirting, right?
...Oh, right, that's weird for you, isn't it? I could try to cover it with my fur, but something tells me that goes against the spirit of the game.
Heh, it's rare somebody calls me cute. I'm a little more used to handsome. But hey, how about I show you how cute I can be?
I might not speak your language, ol' Paska, but I think you and I could be friends. Furry fellas like you and I need to stick together.
I am pretty light on my feet -- and, yeah, I would hope I'm dashing.
You can't blame me, right? Distraction is key to a good sleight of hand.
I guess you could call me a beast, but illuminated seems like a stretch.
Well, me and the boys do enjoy a little chaos. That's what's kept Inspector Fox on our tails for so long.
It's important to me too, as it turns out. From the days of cavemen to the modern era, the Cooper Clan has a long and rich history of thieving.
Carmelita and I go way back. She'd say we're archenemies, I'd say we're connected by the red string of fate.
Well, I'd say I've been all around the block. It's less about species to me, and more about the man or woman themselves.
Well, I'm not the type to expose my secret identity so casually. I could be anybody under this mask.
You've got an astute eye, Miss. This cane's been passed down through my family for generations. I'm just its latest inheritor.
You seem nice enough, Miss, so I'd be happy to let you take a look. Fair warning - I don't know useful it'll be to somebody who isn't a raccoon. Now, with that out of the way...
Depends on how you define "variety," but people come in all shapes, sizes, and textures where I'm from. And, well, we all look a little different down below...
My family's followed a code of honor since the days of the Egyptians, Fina. We only steal from other master criminals. There's just no fun in ripping off ordinary folk.
Sorry to say I've never met a Lucario, whatever animal that is. No, I'm a raccoon -- and you're about to get a very intimate idea of what that means.
No costumes here, friend -- I'm al naturale. Speaking of which, I'll show you my rocket right now, if you'd like to take a gander...
I'm al naturale, friend. No costume could have fur this fluffy. But hey, if you want to see my rocket, feel free...
Funny you say that, Heris. I didn't think I'd see a "human" here, but you seem furry enough for my tastes.
Hey, take it up with Slytunkhamen. Not my fault I'm named for a guy who lived 3000 years ago.
This name runs in the family, Miss. Started with Slytunkhamen the First some 3000 years ago.
Not my finest moment, but wouldn't you do whatever it takes to be with the woman you love?
I'm just letting you win. You think a master thief doesn't know how to take the win whenever he feels like it?
And I rarely meet a woman so eager to take it. In fact, most women I meet try to shoot me. You're a welcome change of pace, Ms. Geist.
Why keep the money when you can just put it all on an abandoned island in the middle of nowhere? Really helps getting around taxes.
Bentley might have the brains and Murray definitely has the brawns, but neither of them quite have the charm.
Grand larceny, robbery, all kinds of illegal sporting events... If you're attracted to danger, I'm a pretty dangerous guy.
I normally try to stay out of the spotlight, but if it gets a beautiful woman like you to stare at me, I'd say it's worth it.
Yeah, that's... not happening.
Right, deterministic. I know all about it. {small}Uh, Bentley, what does "deterministic" mean...?
That's a tough one, Miss... If I were to guess, I'd say the Clockwerk parts. They're the pieces to a robotic exoskeleton, and I'm not sure you can even measure their value.
I've stolen too many things to remember, but if I had to hazard the guess, the Clockwerk parts can hardly have their value measured. Put them together, and you end up with a robotic exoskeleton.
A rebel? Yeah, you could say that. For instance, I don't really place much value in wearing pants, so...
Lots of people call me a bad boy. Usually Inspector Fox. For one, I'm not much one for wearing pants, so...
Well, Nami, if I were being honest with you -- I just really, really like stealing. Nothing fires me up more than a good heist.
The reward of stealing hardly matters to me. I'm something of an adrenaline junkie, I guess. I just can't stop myself from pulling off heists.

Every raccoon I've met looks a lot like me, but that might be because they're all my ancestors. As for a girlfriend, foxes are more my style. Of course, I'm open to any woman if they look like you, Miss.
Do you mean my dashing good looks and charms, my thieving skills, or my laundry list of people that have tried to kill me because of those things?
Well, you know, then, that the working class just don't have much to steal. Why bother with those barely scraping by when we could be going after the guys at the top, you know?
It's all in the name, isn't it? We're sly, rascally rogues at heart... But we've got strong senses of honor, and we like to get right to the point.
I can't speak for every raccoon, but every one I've met is clever and rascally... But a gentleman with a good heart, one who would never keep a good lady waiting.
It's always nice to meet another thief -- and I so rarely meet ones who don't want to turn me into a fur coat. But if you think I'm overdressed, I think I know how we can solve that...
And I'm happy to see somebody a little furrier around here -- even if I've got a little more than you do. But if my clothes a problem, I'm more than happy to get them out of the way...
It's a good thing I'm used to the plan falling apart immediately.
The plan fell apart that quickly, huh? No worries. I'm used to thinking on my feet.
Just like that, huh? Well, not like I'm in any position to complain.
You've all beaten me fair and square. Figure I should treat you for that.
Well done, everyone. Still, you'll have to try harder to bring down my lead.
Not having a plan hurts, but being solidly in the lead definitely helps.
Think you can take me down? Lots of people have tried, but none have succeeded just yet.
That's the luck of the draw, I suppose. Don't expect to be so fortunate next time.
One little loss doesn't bother me much. Though, this might not be so little...
Hey, that's the nature of the game. Now, to do something about this "pants" situation...
Stripping or watching others strip -- neither bothers me much, if I'm being honest.
Even if I can't establish a lead, I think I've still got good odds. Just you wait and see.
You all are playing for keeps, huh? Well, I am too.
Defeat is bitter, but I can't complain much if it's you fine folks dishing it out.
There's always next time -- and I assure you, I'm going to try my hardest.
First round and I'm already losing. That's the luck of the draw for you.
Didn't expect it to be this quickly, but I was hoping I might lose a round or two.
In a bit of a jam, Bentley. You think you could hack the dealer's database?
Can't tell the guys about this round. They think I'm undefeated at poker.
Getting my butt handed to me in a game of poker... Who am I, Murray?
Think you could give me a break? Ah, well. Not like I need it.
I've been pushed to the brink of defeat plenty of times. Trust me, I always find a way.
This is one way to steal the show, isn't it? I hope you and your fuzzy little friend are enjoying the view.
Aww, she's just shy. I'm sure she'll come around eventually. ...By the way, can you actually tell what she's saying?
Glad you're enjoying the show, Miss Fox. I would've done this anyway, but a woman as cute as you just makes it all the better.
Funny you should say that. I've come to learn that foxes are my type -- whether they're feisty inspectors, or adorable maidens.
That so? Hey, then you can call me whatever you want. If you think we're so compatible, I'm willing to put it to the test.
Oh, you meant that type of chaos. I've committed a lot of crimes, but cold-blooded murder isn't among them. Rest assured that my hands are clean as they come.
I'm just messing with you, Miss. Never met a human before, so it's funny to be called "humanoid." Guessing most furry things where you're from aren't as talkative as me.
But hey, if you're not convinced, I'll show you just how dirty I really am.
The reward is nice, but I can only get my thrills by stealing from the toughest marks. Master criminals like me... Now that I think of it, do you consider yourself a master criminal?

A guy's gotta eat, and I can only do that with the money from a good score, but there's just no fun in ripping off the ordinary and the helpless. Now, master criminals, on the other hand... You consider yourself one?
Nothing left to be sold, I'm afraid. After Carmelita destroyed the power source, everything turned to rust. But trust me, it's for the best.
I'm sure there'd be a nice payday involved, but Carmelita -- thankfully -- turned those parts into nothing but rust. Trust me when I say that that's the best outcome.
Now I'd think a princess would know better than to judge someone for foreign customs. This here is perfectly normal where I'm from.
Sorry, I'd have to decline. I've had a few bad experiences with other people trying to get their hands on this. Prefer to keep it on me at all times.
I like to keep my rap sheet varied. Besides, all goes to plan, most of us are gonna commit a crime or two before the night's end.
I think it doesn't matter anyway. Maybe it was sheer chance, or maybe life had a role picked out for me from the start. Either way, it's one I'm more than happy to play.
You've got nothing to worry about. I only steal from fellow criminals -- the rich and powerful ones, at that. I try to give back to my community, not crush it.
I'm pretty good with my arms and feet, yeah. Wouldn't be much of a thief otherwise. Of course, that comes in handy in other places, too.
Apparently it's "bad form" to enter a game like this without being fully clothed. I'm not much for pants normally.
Most of the time, I don't even wear pants. But this place has something of a dress code, so I couldn't enter without 'em.
Well, I think I should give you fine people a proper introduction. I'm the latest descendant of the Cooper Clan, a lineage of raccoon thieves spanning decades.
Oh, you all knew this was coming, didn't you? I couldn't let you take me down without one trick up my sleeve, could I?
If you doubt I'm a master thief, let me tell you about my first big heist -- stealing back the pages of my family's book. Y'see, it was stolen when I was really young, and I wound up in an orphanage.
Y'know, us Coopers have made a lot of enemies -- some that have pursued us across generations.
So it's come all the way down to this, huh? Not much left for me to do now but show you what I've been hiding up here...
Well, isn't that beautiful? A friendship that doesn't need words. I like to think me and the boys are the same way.
Impressive, you say? I don't know what the guys back home are like for you, but I promise I know exactly how to treat a foxy lady.
C'mon, Miss, do you really think I'm so underhanded? You'd be right, sure, but that's beside the point.
Well... No promises.
That so? Well, I like mature women as much as any other raccoon. Tells me that you already know how to handle a scoundrel like me.
Interesting for you to be talking about costumes, Myriam. When are you gonna take off that funny little man suit?
You can trick the tool out all you want, but it's not the equipment that makes a master thief. In my book, it's all about skill and experience.
Well, I am a man, just not a human. Either way, don't worry. It takes more than that to get under my fur.
Expecting some fluff? Guess I'm a little more similar to you humans down there than I thought. Me, though, I'm much more interested in seeing how much fluff you have, Miss Mari.
Oh yeah, and before I forget -- Uno.
Sorry to disappoint you guys, but I'm not actually Italian. I know, I know, hold your surprise.
Well, would you look at that? Seems you fine people already got me nice and fired up.
Seems I have no need to wait for further excitement -- I'm plenty fired up as-is.
Well, that's a relief. You go your whole life letting the breeze fly through down there, and it feels suffocating when it can't.
Alright, I'm feeling a little better. Most people where I'm from don't even wear pants. Can't wait to see the rest of you without yours.
I might not have Murray's muscles, but you don't do some thieving without building up a physique.
We've passed down our greatest techniques for generations with the help of an ancient book, the Thievius Raccoonus.
It wasn't all bad, though. It was in that orphanage that I met my lifelong pals and partners-in-crime -- Bentley, the brains of our outfit, and Murray, the brawn.
But I'm actually thankful for all the enemies I've made. One of them turned out to be Inspector Carmelita Fox, Interpol agent and the love of my life. I'll never get tired of our cat-and-mouse game.
The mask stays on, though. How would I protect my identity without it?
Sets Sly's penis to erect if he was already excited.
Sets Sly's penis to flaccid if he's not already excited.
Sets Sly's custom shadow to be visible.
So, you're some kinda card shark, are you? All the ones I know are actual sharks, so this is a little strange.
I take it you're a card shark, Fate. Weird that you're not an actual shark, though.
I know a thing or two about that game of yours, Yuno. Play it all the time with Murray. Never thought anybody would play it professionally, though.
"Uno," right? Murray loves a good game of that. I've played it a lot with him, but I never thought I'd run into anybody who plays it professionally.
A cop and world-renowned thief Sly Cooper in the same room. You're not here to arrest me, are you?
I would've thought there's a peace treaty in a place like this. Tell me you're not gonna kill the mood by slapping handcuffs on me.
You know, I get the sense you're pretty smart, Anatoly. Bet you and Bentley would have fun together -- I can barely tell what he's saying half the time.
I wouldn't expect that humans and animals could be such good friends like you and Paska. Guess that bodes well for you and me.
You kinda remind me of Dimitri, Yusuke. You both just can't get enough of art... and you're both a little out there.
I can't help but think of Dimitri when I look at you, Yusuke. I hope you're not gonna tell me to show my bling and let you shine me.
The Phantom Thieves of Hearts, huh? Something tells me you don't steal stuff as material as what I do.
We're both Phantom Thieves, I think, but I'm not really sure how you would steal a heart... Not in a gruesome way, I hope.
One of my old frenemies, Dimitri, is the artist type. I'm glad to meet one that isn't a complete weirdo like him.
My old enemy-turned-ally, Dimitri, is an artist, and one heck of an eccentric one at that. I'm just glad that not every painter is an oddball like him.
Happens to the best of us, ~name~. Even I've lost on a few occasions.
Ready to show us what you've got, ~name~? Personally, I'm more than ready to see it.
You challenge me, ~name~, then you'd better be ready to pay the ante when I win.

Great work, ~name~. That went off without a hitch.
I'm right behind you, ~name~. In more ways than one.
I'm getting ready to join you, ~name~... Just a little more.
Only wish we could've done it together, ~name~. But hey, now you get to watch me.
Wonder what you were thinking about, ~name~... or who.
You want to know my intentions, right? A thief never reveals his hand, but I'm willing to make an exception.
You know the rules, ~name~. I don't, I've just been winging it.
Keep that chin up, ~name~. Be sure to take it nice and slow.
I'm not much of a voyeur, but I've been looking forward to this all the same.
Look at it this way, ~name~; now you get to do the fun part.
You already know how good this is from watching me, yeah?
On the bright side, I get to be a little less lonely down here.
Would you prefer a hands-on approach, ~name~? Well, the standard way is fine too.
Let's see what you're made of, ~name~.
Of course, I'll be asking for a show in return. It's just no fun if I don't get a reaction for my efforts.
An exciting field examination into how ~name~'s species keeps themselves sane.
You want me to instruct you, ~name~? I'm pretty good at leading jobs.
Feel free to look at me, ~name~. I'll be sure to look at you plenty.
Nothing guilty or shameful about enjoying yourself, ~name~... especially among willing company.
And now, our tango can finally commence.
If there's one thing I can contribute to the Thievius Raccoonus, it's my "Beautiful Women Attraction Technique."
I'm not used to watching women do this. Usually it's my fingers doing the pleasuring.
Don't rush it, ~name~. A good heist requires planning and precision.
You don't mind if I tug on your tail while I'm behind you, right? I've been waiting to get my hands on it...
If this is some sort of Interpol honeypot trap, then I'm glad they at least sent their most beautiful operative to do the job.
How sensitive are your ears, anyway? I guess I'll find out when I whisper your name into them...
A woman with as much experience as you must not be an easy lay. I might be young, but I swear I can show you a good time.
A raccoon's tongue isn't anything special, I know. My expertise more than makes up for it.
I'm sure most men just want to push you down and have their way with you. Me, though, I can see the animal inside of you, and I just can't wait for you to unleash it.
I think my sticky fingers are pretty applicable here. When I start touching you, I'm not sure I'll be able to pull away.
I just want to run my fingers through your hair so badly... and I'm talking about the hair everywhere on your body.
As a reward for your service, how about a gift? A lady like you deserves a toy or two for a lonely night, don't you think?
To think that the thief could have his heart stolen like this... Care to take responsibility, Miss Fox?
...I can tell you want me deep inside of you, you know. The way your body's begging for it is just so cute.
Even somebody as sweet as you must get frustrated from time to time, hmm? Feel free to take it out on me. Being on bottom is its own kind of fun.
Wherever you want my tongue, just say the word and I'll get to work. No place on a goddess can be impure, right?
I know that you know I've been ogling your butt. I can't help but stare... and wonder if you'd be so kind as to allow entrance.
If there's one thing I know about foxes, it's that they're awfully clingy... Heh, in more ways than one.
Don't worry, I know how to set the mood. A nice room in Paris with a view of the Eiffel Tower... Of course, you won't want to take your eyes off me.
And here I thought giving the cops the slip was the most exciting part of my day.
Out of anybody at this joint who could join me, I'm glad it was ~name~.
You must be a gem among your species, ~name~. No way they're all this beautiful.
Need another round after this. I wanna make sure to join ~name~ next time.
Just got a call from Bentley about a rare jewel in transit near here... Eh, it can wait.
Listening is just as fun as watching, it turns out.
You afraid of anybody finding out about this, ~name~? Just wear a mask.
If only I could see sights like this every day.
Nothing can ruin my mood right now... Well, except for the police crashing this joint.
Here's hoping that this operation is far from complete.
You make some cute noises, ~name~. Wonder what I could get out of you.
You're already beautiful, ~name~, but this might be my favorite look for you.
Never seen a forfeit this sweet in my life. More games should have stuff like this.
How about we both pick up the pace, ~name~?
I should try doing something like this with Carmelita.
This is a typical night for you, ~name~? You sure seem to be enjoying yourself.
Every species acts just a little different in bed. Care to show me what yours is like, ~name~?
Wouldn't you just agree that there's no better feeling than fur-to-fur contact?
Diving into the unknown is fun and all, but I'd never pass up a chance with the familiar like ~name~.
I'm sure you've heard plenty of rumors about us raccoons, ~name~. I hope I've proven to you that only the good ones are true.
What would you say to me joining you, ~name~? Ah, but watching you squirm by yourself is so much fun.
Did I steal your heart yet, ~name~? If you say no, then I'll just have to try even harder.
I can show you the true meaning of doing it like animals, ~name~.
Don't be shy, ~name~. Everybody deserves to indulge themselves once in a while.
Bet you didn't think this was how you'd be spending your evening... but I'm also betting you're so glad it was.
You're so beautiful like that, ~name~. More than any jewel I've ever laid eyes upon.
If this might be the only night we ever spend together, let's make it one to remember.
A lone night together, or something a little more long-term? Either way, I promise you wouldn't just be another notch for me.
I'm almost sad I can't steal you away from your world, ~name~. Imagine the fun we'd have together.
I wonder just how compatible we are down there. Only one way to find out, right?
Oh, now this is a nice sight...
I was wondering earlier if you could do this...
When our tails are intertwining while I'm emptying myself deep inside of you... After that, I think I can ascend to Heaven.
The size difference is what makes this fun. It'll be easy to pick you, settle you in, and go to town...
I know how important aftercare must be to you. I'm pretty good at massages... and giving them a happy ending, if you're up for round two.
Every part of you just looks so good... Even if you weren't one, I'd say you were created by a goddess. Mind if I sample everything you have to offer?
Let it all out, Senko. Tell me everything you want me to do... I'm at your beck and call.
A wonderful performance as expected. I can only hope that I was of assistance... and that I got you excited to be a little more direct.
Happy to have helped, ~name~.
Glad to see the climaxes are just as explosive here, too.
You gonna try for a round two, ~name~?
And another criminal mastermind taken down by Sly Cooper. Her crime: stealing my heart.
Right there with you, ~name~. Just give me a little time.
That's right... A little more fuel for my fire.
Aw, and I was enjoying watching you so much, ~name~.
Only wish I could've played a more direct role.
I'm not usually the first one down, but I guess this is what happens when you expose yourself so early.
I'm the first one up, huh? Wish I could've gotten to observe a little more, but at least now I don't have to worry about playing.
Now what man could reject attention from you, Miss Fox? Or should I say, what raccoon?
Well, well. Seems you've all claimed victory over me. That could only mean I owe you a show, right?
I'd love to have some more fun with you later, but for now, we can just enjoy this beautiful moment.
I'll just set this down first. Wouldn't want it getting in the way while I'm getting to the fun part.

state.text: Sets Sly's cane and tail to change position during his forfeit and makes his penis and shadow invisible.

case.state: You've got me figured out so fast? Well, they say foxes are cunning...
Don't tempt me so fast, Miss Fox... I've hardly even started...
You've never done this with someone with a tail, huh? Don't worry, this isn't my first rodeo...
At this rate, you're gonna make me wish I was in jail...
Anywhere? I'll be sure to take you up on that...
I enjoy foreplay as much as the next guy, don't worry... but a thief has to be quick, right?
Nngh... Don't say that, Miss Fox, you'll make me finish just by imagining it...
That so? Well, there's more things I can deposit with you than just jewels.
I don't doubt that there's plenty of things you can teach me...
Talk about starting the day off right...
I'd imagine you're ten times the cook Murray is, so that definitely sounds like an upgrade...
Yeah? Care to prove it?
I only pull out my charms when I want to see beautiful foxes fall out of their dresses.
Any side of you is worth a look in my book.
So if I treat you well, you'll show me something special? That sounds like a good trade.
I like keeping my treasures to myself, personally. If I took them, it's only fair...
I don't like staying in one place, but... I'm more than willing to make an exception.
Had so many back-to-back heists lately that I haven't been able to do this.
I need plenty of eye candy to do this. Good thing all of you fine people are here.
Reminds me of the last night Carmelita and I spent in Cairo...
And I thought Indian strip poker was fun.
How's my pace, you think? I like to take it nice and slow.
My fur gets in the way a little, but I think ladies and gentlemen both like it when it brushes up against them.
Mm... I prefer the company of others, but my own fingers can do me just fine.
Sometimes, I do this on boring stakeouts. Helps to pass the time.
Think I've built a pretty good technique. Technical and precise, just the way I like it.
I know I'm probably a little different from what you all are used to, but I hope you're liking this all the same.
You think raccoons are endowed? You should see tanukis.
Games like this should be more common. Everybody deserves a chance to explore themselves every now and then.
Fur even gets in my way sometimes... Ahh... But I like the way it feels...
Being surrounded by beautiful people? Now how could that... Nn... Ever get old...?
Haah... I've got plenty of stamina, but even I can get worn out...
I won't leave anything to the imagination. You want to see all I've got? I'm more than happy to provide it.
Best part about being with other guys? Mm... Taught me a lot about how to make myself feel good...
A good Cooper knows how to put on a show. We're gentlemen, after all.
I'm not the biggest raccoon around, but I think I more than make up for it with experience...
The feel of her thighs, the way her face tenses up... Sorry, sorry, I know better than to use my imagination...
Too bad more of Bentley's plans don't involve a little seduction...
Aah... I don't usually feel this pent-up... The game must've gotten me all excited...
This technique... Heh, think I'll have to keep it to myself...
Somebody else's hands, or a mouth, or even... Lots of things I wish would get offered to me right now...
Ah, yeah... This is just what I need right now...
You wanna try being on top this time, Carmelita? Hey, I don't mind...
Getting pretty close now... I can feel it...
A Cooper never leaves a job half-finished...
Mm... Inspector Fox...
Maybe next time, I shouldn't even bother with the stripping... Just get right to it...
Ahh... Carmelita...!
Ohh... Carmelita, I...!
Ah, yeah... That's it...!
Ahh... I'm gonna...!
Well, that was fun. Seems my imagination was working in tandem with my eyes there.
Heh... Between you all and the memories I have of Inspector Fox, I'd say I had plenty of great material there.
Gonna have to check in with the guys after this. Hope Murray didn't eat everything in the van again...
Game's still going, huh? Well, not that I mind. Even more eye candy to take in.
Any of you ever been to the Kunlun Mountains? Been there a couple times. Beautiful place, except for all the crazy dictators that keep popping up.
Maybe this joint should try hosting on an island. I hear there's prime real estate in the Bermuda Triangle right now.
I got so used to hanging around other criminals, almost forgot what it was like to chill with some regular folk.
I'm fine with sitting around and letting others do the work sometimes, but I always get antsy if I'm out of action for too long.
Any Cooper would've done well in a game like this. Of course, sometimes you just can't beat Lady Luck.
Strip poker's not illegal anywhere, yeah? Don't wanna have to worry about the cops.
Gotta keep a close eye on my cane. Had a few bad experiences, and now I get a little anxious if anybody else touches it.
I get to have a good time and watch other attractive people afterwards? I'm starting to understand why Murray likes games so much.
Eat your heart out, Miss Bat.
I know how frustrating it is to get so close, only for the job to go wrong. Guess I'll just have to take care of myself later.
Well, that was a good time. Maybe next time, you'll all try a little harder to beat me, huh?
I had my suspicions, ~player~, but it seems you really are a master thief. Here, take this - I learned a lot from that book.
Well, that was a nice distraction. Now, if any police officer shows up, just tell them that you've never seen hide nor hair of any Sly Cooper.
Haven't had this much fun in a while. Now, if you'll excuse me, there's a precious artifact in Bangladesh with my name on it.
Well, that was a nice distraction. Now, if any police officer shows up, just tell them that you've never seen hide nor hair of any Sly Cooper.
